location.address: Champ de Mars, 5 Avenue Anatole France, 75007 Paris, France

details.description: The Eiffel Tower is a wrought-iron lattice tower on the Champ de Mars in Paris, France. It is named after the engineer Gustave Eiffel, whose company designed and built the tower.

photos.description: A stunning 4K view of the Eiffel Tower during the day.
The Eiffel Tower illuminated at night in 4K resolution.
Aerial 4K shot of the Eiffel Tower and the surrounding area.
Close-up 4K image showing the intricate details of the Eiffel Tower's ironwork.

reviews.comment: An amazing experience! The view from the top is breathtaking.
Beautiful landmark, but the lines were quite long.

nearby_attractions.name: Louvre Museum
nearby_attractions.description: The world's largest art museum and a historic monument in Paris, France.

nearby_attractions.name: Notre-Dame Cathedral
nearby_attractions.description: A medieval Catholic cathedral with stunning Gothic architecture.
